title: Where to Get HM Rock Climb in Pokémon Diamond

steps.title: Go to the west side of Celestic Town.
steps.content: Go to the west side of Celestic Town.

steps.title: Walk to the route closest to the west side of Celestic Town.
steps.content: Walk to the route closest to the west side of Celestic Town.

steps.title: Continue going west until you reach the entrance to a cave.
steps.content: Continue going west until you reach the entrance to a cave.

steps.title: Go north of where you are until you reach a wall, and then go west.
steps.content: Go north of where you are until you reach a wall, and then go west.

steps.title: Go 1 space north of the rocks near the stairs.
steps.content: Go 1 space north of the rocks near the stairs.

steps.title: Go north until you see some stairs.
steps.content: Go north until you see some stairs.

steps.title: Go up the stairs and try to find the exit.
steps.content: Go up the stairs and try to find the exit.

steps.title: Go west through the snow and get in the house to heal your Pokémon.
steps.content: Go west through the snow and get in the house to heal your Pokémon.

steps.title: Get out of the house and go through the grass near the house.
steps.content: Get out of the house and go through the grass near the house.

steps.title: Go north until the snow turns into a blizzard.
steps.content: Go north until the snow turns into a blizzard.

steps.title: Go northwest until you see a house.
steps.content: Go northwest until you see a house.

steps.title: Go inside the house and talk to the man.
steps.content: Go inside the house and talk to the man.

steps.title: He will talk about his lost HM.
steps.content: He will talk about his lost HM.

steps.title: Go outside the house and look for an item northeast of the house.
steps.content: Go outside the house and look for an item northeast of the house.

steps.title: Now you have HM08 Rock Climb.
steps.content: Now you have HM08 Rock Climb.
